description: Beautiful riding through lush and open forest. Something for everyone, including classic XC riding and some trails with built-up obstacles. Very well maintained and generally well signed.This network of xc ski/bike trails is located on the west shore of Upper Arrow lakes. Trail length, duration and difficulty depend on what trails you pick. You should bring a map from a local bike shop or the forest district to find your way: (http://bikerevelstoke.org/enter/wp-content/uploads/2010/04/Macpherson_BikeTrail_Map_FEB_2013-662x1024.jpg)A network of interconnecting XC trails that in the summer, double as some great MTBing.  Most trails are pretty short but there are many oppurtunities to link up shorter trails with many others.More info here (and *GREAT* ski tips): www.revelstokenordic.org/If you are looking for DH riding head to Mt. Mackenzie.This trail is very close to:
directions: Head west from Revelstoke crossing the bridge over Upper arrow lakes. Turn south on Hwy 23 just after the bridge (like heading to the ferry).About 5 minutes south (~7km) you'll see a sign for MacPherson XC ski trails. there are 2 parking lots, pick the one closest to the trails you want.
title: Mt. MacPherson
